column2: Jerash Holdings (US), Inc. operates as a holding company. The company is headquartered in Rochester, New York and currently employs 3,000 full-time employees. The Company, through its subsidiaries, is engaged in the manufacturing and exporting of customized and ready-made sportswear and outerwear from knitted fabrics. The firm offers its apparel and fabric products to several brands engaged in the clothing retail industry. Its subsidiaries include Jerash Garments and Fashions Manufacturing Company Limited, Treasure Success International Limited, Chinese Garments and Fashions Manufacturing Company Limited, and Jerash for Industrial Embroidery Company Limited. The Companyâ€™s fabric production and apparel manufacturing facilities are located in Amman, Jordan.
